summary: Passionate Web Designer & Developer with expertise in crafting exceptional digital experiences. I specialize in building scalable applications using modern frontend frameworks and backend systems. My approach combines technical excellence with creative problem-solving, collaborating closely with clients to transform their visions into reality. With a diverse IT background, I excel in both independent and team environments, consistently delivering high-quality solutions guided by industry best practices.

experience.title: Senior Front End Engineer
highlights: Architected and scaled web applications for Toyota, Lexus and Nissan that serve millions of users globally.
Built an enterprise-grade applications with React, TypeScript, Next.js and Astro focused on performance and reusability.
Implemented cutting-edge WebGL and VR/AR features through cross-functional collaboration with design and backend teams.

experience.title: Senior Web Developer
highlights: Engineered advanced, custom WordPress themes and plugins, integrating React to build dynamic and interactive front-end experiences.
Delivered comprehensive full-stack solutions that enhanced site performance and demonstrably increased user engagement.

experience.title: Web Developer
highlights: Engineered custom WordPress websites and standalone PHP applications, providing full-cycle development from initial design through to deployment.
Translated specific client requirements and business objectives into robust technical solutions, including custom themes, plugins, and tailored web applications.

experience.title: Web Developer
highlights: Served as the lead web developer in a design-centric agency, responsible for translating high-fidelity visual concepts into pixel-perfect, functional WordPress websites.
Architected and built custom, high-performance WordPress themes and plugins from the ground up to solve unique business challenges for a diverse client portfolio.

education.details: Practical training in modern web design & development
Foundations in software, networking & digital systems
